TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FreeformActivityDesigner extends System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: Provides a customizable activity designer surface for users to visually modify on a workflow design surface.

span.span: Provides a customizable activity designer surface for users to visually modify on a workflow design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 使用 ，用户可以修改活动在工作流设计图面上的显示方式。The allows users to modify how an activity appears on a workflow design surface. 如果使用 属性将 `Designer` 与自定义活动类关联，则当用户将自定义活动放到设计图面上时，自定义活动的外观会不同于其他活动。When you associate with a custom activity class using the `Designer` attribute, the custom activity's appearance is different from other activities when a user drops the custom activity onto a design surface. 当 在设计图面上显示活动后，用户即可将连接器拖到其他活动设计器，并在设计图面所定义的参数中调整设计器大小。Once displays an activity on the design surface, users can draw connectors to other activity designers and resize the designer within the parameters defined by the design surface. > [!NOTE] > 用户只能将连接器添加到自定义活动，因为 与工作流中的顶级活动关联。Users can only add connectors to the custom activity because the is associated with the top-level activity in a workflow.

summary.span: Gets an that accessibility applications use to adjust the application UI for users who have impairments.

span.span: Gets an that accessibility applications use to adjust the application UI for users who have impairments.
The associated with the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前没有给控件分配 `AccessibleObject`，则会创建后者的一个新实例。If no `AccessibleObject` is currently assigned to the control, a new instance of one is created. > [!NOTE] > 要获取或设置 `AccessibilityObject` 属性，必须添加对与 .NET Framework 一起安装的 Accessibility 程序集的引用。To get or set the `AccessibilityObject` property, you must add a reference to the Accessibility assembly installed with the .NET Framework. [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)]辅助性对象的更多信息，请参见 MSDN Library 中的“Active Accessibility”部分。 accessible objects, see the Active Accessibility section of the MSDN Library.

span.span: A that represents the size of the margin to render around the child designers of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的默认大小是一个 对象，其宽度和高度均为 40 像素。The default size of is a object with dimensions of 40 pixels by 40 pixels. 如果将与当前工作流主题关联的 属性设置为 `true`，则 设置是网格高度和宽度大小的一半。If the property associated with the current workflow theme is set to `true`, settings are half the height and half the width of the grid size. 设置 时，会更新 的布局。When you set , the layout of the is updated.
